original_title: トモダチゲーム 劇場版FINAL
overview: They find that the person who attracted them to the Tomodachi Game is Tenji Mikasa. Maria Minase, who is a mysterious figure, takes part in the team which Yuichi Katagiri and Tenji Mikasa belong to. Will this test their love and trust for each other, as Yuichi gets deeper into this game of business?
tagline: In order to win the Friends Game, you can't doubt your friends.
title: Friends Games: The Final Movie
